item.title: Avast Wi-Fi Finder helps you find trustworthy Wi-Fi connections globally
item.description:
Avast has released Avast Wi-Fi Finder, an Android app that helps users locate trustworthy, fast, and secure Wi-Fi connections no matter where they are. The app uses a map interface to display recommended and crowdsourced hotspots. “Many of us, whether traveling or working remotely, have struggled to find dependable and secure Wi-Fi,” said Gagan Singh, President of mobile at Avast. “With Avast Wi-Fi Finder, consumers can now easily locate a safe and fast Wi-Fi connection at the gym, hotel, airport, bus station, library, or caf√©...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/avast-wi-fi-finder-helps-you-find-trustworthy-wi-fi-connections-globally/
